page.title: 13NEW HOUSES IN NORTH HOLMWOOD
page.content: HOLMWOOD ESTATE (NORTH HOLMWOOD): The houses range in price from Â£38,000 to Â£62,000. Building started in 1983 and is to be completed by 1988. 91 houses are occupied (July 1985) and 159 are still to be built. The estate covers the site of the old brickworks. CHART GARDENS (Chart Downs Estate): This will be local authority housing available for a weekly rent. 10 bungalows and 18 flat units were started in February 1985 and will be comlpeted in a year. The development costs Â£700,000 and will cover 3 acres of previously uncultivated land. THE BUILDERS: Most of the workmen come from nearby villages or towns,they work 8 hours a day and earn Â£ 150_200 a week. A pond in the area will be cleared and some wildlife will be lost.
